1.「……そなたの ご主人は ワシが責任を持って| 探すゆえ 安心してくだされ。|: I will be responsible for finding your|husband, so you can rest assured. I am|indebted to him.

7.「紹介しよう。こちらのマレイカどのは| 戦争で行方不明になった ご主人を探しに|: Let me introduce you. Maleika here has|returned to Arahagiro in search of her|husband, who was lost in the war.

16.「戦争の時 まもの使いたちには| だいぶ 助けられたからの……。| ワシからも: The soldiers helped me a lot during the war, so|I would like to ask for your help as well.

18.「カレヴァンは 左目に十字キズがある青年でな| きっと 魔物になっても 左目に|: Kalevan is a young man with a cross-shaped|scar over his left eye, which will remain|there when he becomes a monster.

|the Kudus Spring. I'll try to restore it to|its or[...]

20.「では <pc>！| カレヴァンの捜索 頼んだぞよ！: Well then <pc>! You've got to find|Kalevan for me!

22.「奥方のためにも それらの依頼は| 速やかに片付け 急いで戻ってまいるのじゃ。|: For the sake of your wife, you must quickly|complete those requests and hurry back. I will|be waiting for you here.

23.「ぬっ！？ そうか おぬしも| 忙しいんじゃな……。: Huh? ! I see, you've been busy...

24.「しかし 奥方と幼子が 困っておるのを| このまま 放っておくわけにもいかんしの: But I can't just leave the wife and child in|trouble like this. If you change your mind,|ask me again.

27.「お願いします <pc>さま。| この子を 安心させてあげたくて……。: Please <pc>. I just wanted to|reassure you that this little girl...

35.「へえー！ その…ぶれいぶすとーん？| っていうのを使えば 元の世界に戻れるんだ: Heh! So you can get back to your original|world by using... I can get back to my|original world if I use that.

37.「じゃあ <pc>さんと 一緒に戻って| カレヴァンさんが その泉に つかれば|: So if you and <pc> go back to the|fountain, and Mr. Kalevan reaches it, he'll|revert to his human form. ...
